description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Madeira, Portugal. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Madeira Oceanfront Luxury near Funchal with Rooftop Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Watch the wonders of Madeira unfurl before you from this cliffside luxury retreat on the Portuguese island’s shimmering southern coast. Come for the unrivalled Portuguese culture and rich iridescent sunsets and stay for the luxe facilities, including a restorative spa, squash court, outdoor swimming pools - including a breathtaking infinity pool - and shuttle bus to and from Funchal. Sharpen your appetite with bold, authentic flavours at Alambique Restaurant. For something more casual, Engenho Restaurant is ideal for a feast overlooking the ocean. In the evening, enjoy a drink at Fly Lounge Bar, Trapiche Bar or Calhau Bar overlooking the sunset, while unforgettable nights are forged at Rhum Bar. A luxuriously serene escape, this private oasis ensures every moment will be one to remember.

hotels.title: Oceanfront Madeira Bliss with Onsite Wellness Spa, Three Saltwater Pools, Six Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Ready for a blissful escape where you can relax to the sound of the Atlantic Ocean waves crashing on the beach? Rejuvenate at this five-star retreat on the southern coast of Portugal’s most charming island. Spend days dipping in and out of one of three saltwater pools, eat your weight's worth of delicious cuisine at four onsite restaurants, sip a cocktail while listening to live music at Lisboa Bar or indulge in a luxurious treatment at Thalasso Sea Spa.
